mapper.select: SELECT ID, FIGURE, GLASS, DRINK_DATE, DRINK_KIND_DRINK_NAME, USER_ID FROM DRINK_RECORD WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id};
SELECT ID, FIGURE, PIECE, SMOKE_DATE, SMOKE_KIND_SMOKE_NAME, USER_ID FROM SMOKE_RECORD WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DRINK_RECORD(FIGURE, GLASS, DRINK_DATE, DRINK_KIND_DRINK_NAME, USER_ID) VALUE (#{record.figure}, #{record.glass}, #{record.drink_date}, #{record.drink_name}, #{record.user_id});
INSERT INTO SMOKE_RECORD(FIGURE, PIECE, SMOKE_DATE, SMOKE_KIND_SMOKE_NAME, USER_ID) VALUE (#{record.figure}, #{record.piece}, #{record.smoke_date}, #{record.smoke_name}, #{record.user_id});
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(GLASS) as TOTAL_GLASS, (SUM(DRINK_PRICE) * SUM(GLASS)) as TOTAL_PRICE FROM DRINK_RECORD AS DR LEFT JOIN DRINK_KIND AS DK ON DR.DRINK_KIND_DRINK_NAME = DK.DRINK_NAME WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id};

SELECT SUM(PIECE) as TOTAL_PIECE, (SUM(SMOKE_PRICE) * SUM(PIECE)) as TOTAL_PRICE FROM SMOKE_RECORD AS SR LEFT JOIN SMOKE_KIND AS SK ON SR.SMOKE_KIND_SMOKE_NAME = SK.SMOKE_NAME WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id};
SELECT DRINK_DATE as DATE, SUM(GLASS) as TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM DRINK_RECORD WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id} AND DRINK_DATE LIKE "%${month}%" GROUP BY DRINK_DATE;
SELECT SMOKE_DATE as DATE, SUM(PIECE) as TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM SMOKE_RECORD WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id} AND SMOKE_DATE LIKE "%${month}%" GROUP BY SMOKE_DATE;
